outcome: The Directorate asserts hard control: curfew and visible patrols, but launches a “Clean Slate” amnesty—select citizen records quietly wiped, with restored privileges only to loyalists. Tension lingers beneath the surface.

events.description: Citywide curfew and visible Directorate patrols return. Streets quiet at night, with compliance scanning drones reminding citizens to return home by 22:00.
Council announces the 'Clean Slate' initiative—citizens with consistently high compliance scores receive record wipes and restored privileges. Others see no change, sparking resentment.
Citizens share stories online about friends whose records vanished overnight. However, rumors spread of selecters blacklisting former protesters. Directorate quietly compiles watchlists.
Visible order returns to the city. Directorate leaders proclaim renewed stability. Underneath, many citizens privately mourn lost trust and worry about sudden disappearances among low scorers.
